Description: Your only limit is your imagination... and resources
ActualRequirements: Place any block

Description: Craft a door to stop monsters from entering your house
ActualRequirements: Obtain any type of door (can be an iron door)

Description: Craft some slabs
ActualRequirements: Obtain any kind of slab

Description: Craft some stairs
ActualRequirements: Obtain any kind of stairs

Description: Craft every type of slab
ActualRequirements:
Obtain the following slabs: Stone, Sandstone, Cobblestone, Brick, Stone Brick, Nether Brick, Quartz, Oak, Spruce, Birch, Jungle, Acacia, Dark Oak, 
Red Sandstone, Purpur, Prismarine, Prismarine Brick, Dark Prismarine, Smooth Stone, Polished Granite, Mossy Stone Brick, Polished Diorite, 
Mossy Cobblestone, End Stone Brick, Smooth Sandstone, Smooth Quartz, Granite, Andesite, Red Nether Brick, Polished Andesite, Diorite, Cut Sandstone, 
Cut Red Sandstone, Smooth Red Sandstone, Crimson, Warped, Blackstone, Polished Blackstone, Polished Blackstone Brick, Cut Copper, Exposed Cut Copper, 
Weathered Cut Copper, Oxidised Cut Copper, Waxed Cut Copper, Waxed Exposed Cut Copper, Waxed Weathered Cut Copper, Waxed Oxidized Cut Copper, Cobbled Deepslate, 
Polished Deepslate, Deepslate Brick, Deepslate Tile, Mangrove, Mud Brick, Bamboo, Bamboo Mosaic, Cherry

Description: Craft every type of stair
ActualRequirements:
Obtain the following stair types: Obtain the following slabs: Stone, Sandstone, Cobblestone, Brick, Stone Brick, Nether Brick, Quartz, Oak, Spruce, Birch, Jungle, Acacia, Dark Oak, 
Red Sandstone, Purpur, Prismarine, Prismarine Brick, Dark Prismarine, Polished Granite, Mossy Stone Brick, Polished Diorite, 
Mossy Cobblestone, End Stone Brick, Smooth Sandstone, Smooth Quartz, Granite, Andesite, Red Nether Brick, Polished Andesite, Diorite, Smooth Red Sandstone, Crimson, Warped, Blackstone, Polished Blackstone, Polished Blackstone Brick, Cut Copper, Exposed Cut Copper, 
Weathered Cut Copper, Oxidised Cut Copper, Waxed Cut Copper, Waxed Exposed Cut Copper, Waxed Weathered Cut Copper, Waxed Oxidized Cut Copper, Cobbled Deepslate, 
Polished Deepslate, Deepslate Brick, Deepslate Tile, Mangrove, Mud Brick, Bamboo, Bamboo Mosaic, Cherry

Description: Sleep in a bed to change your respawn point
ActualRequirements: Sleep in a bed. You do not have to pass the night

Description: Dye your bed a different color
ActualRequirements: Obtain a bed of any color other than white

Description: Craft every color of bed
Go 30 days without sleep
Climb the ladder!
ActualRequirements: Enter a ladder block

Description: Craft and place down a trapdoor
ActualRequirements: Place any type of trapdoor (can be an iron trapdoor)

Description: Craft and place an iron door
ActualRequirements: Place an iron door

Description: Erect some fencing
ActualRequirements: Place any type of fence (can be nether brick fence)

Description: Put up some cobblestone walls
ActualRequirements: Place a cobblestone wall

Description: Craft every type of wall
ActualRequirements:
Obtain the following walls: Cobblestone, Mossy Cobblestone, Brick, Prismarine, Red Sandstone, Mossy Stone Brick, Granite, Stone Brick, Nether Brick, 
Andesite, Red Nether Brick, Sandstone, End Stone Brick, Diorite, Blackstone, Polished Blackstone, Polished Blackstone Brick, Cobbled Deepslate, 
Polished Deepslate, Deepslate Brick, Deepslate Tile, Mud Brick

Description: Craft and place a chest for storing your items
ActualRequirements: Place a chest

Description: Craft and place a barrel. Totally not for riding in
ActualRequirements: Place a barrel

Description: Craft a lectern using wooden slabs and a bookshelf then place it
ActualRequirements: Place a lectern
Notes: Known as "Speech! Speech! Speech!" until 1.7. Still referred to as such internally

Description: Fill a Chiseled Bookshelf with books
ActualRequirements: Place a book inside a Chiseled Bookshelf such that all slots become occupied

Description: Craft and place a sign
ActualRequirements: Place any type of sign

Description: Put up a Hanging Sign
ActualRequirements: Place any type of hanging sign

Description: Use honeycomb to wax a sign, setting its ink for eternity
ActualRequirements: Use honeycomb on any sign

Description: Dye a sign with each color of dye
ActualRequirements: Use all 16 dyes on any sign

Description: Craft an item frame for displaying your items
ActualRequirements: Obtain an item frame
Notes: Known as "Display your items for all to see..." until 1.8

Description: Put up a painting
ActualRequirements: Place a painting

Description: Place every type of painting
ActualRequirements: Every painting is listed on Minecraft wiki at https://minecraft.wiki/w/Painting

Description: Craft and place a banner
Craft a loom with string and planks for creating your own banners
ActualRequirements: Obtain a loom

Description: Craft all 16 banner colors
Craft all the special banner patterns
ActualRequirements: Obtain the following banner patterns: Flower Charge, Creeper Charge, Skull Charge, Thing, Globe and Piglin

Description: Light up the area with some torches
ActualRequirements: Place a torch

Description: Craft and place a campfire using some logs, sticks and coal
Place every type of cookable food on a campfire
ActualRequirements: Place on a campfire: Raw Porkchop, Raw Beef, Raw Chicken, Raw Cod, Raw Salmon, Potato, Raw Mutton, Raw Rabbit, Kelp

Description: Travel close to 0,0 coordinates and place down a campfire
ActualRequirements: Place a campfire with x and z coordinates both being between -10 and 10

Description: Light up with jack o' lanterns!
ActualRequirements: Place a jack o' lantern

AdvancementName: One Pickle, Two Pickle, Sea Pickle, Four
Description: Place four sea pickles in a group underwater
ActualRequirements: Place a sea pickle on top of three existing sea pickles to create a group of four

Description: Place a candle and light it using Flint and Steel
Parent: One Pickle, Two Pickle, Sea Pickle, Four
ActualRequirements: Light any type of candle or candle cake using either Flint and Steel or a Fire Charge

Description: Get one stack of Black Candles
Place a candle on a cake
Light up the area using a lantern
ActualRequirements: Place a lantern

Description: Light up the area with glowstone
ActualRequirements: Place a glowstone block

Description: Light up the area with some redstone lamps
ActualRequirements: Place a redstone lamp

Description: Light up the area with Shroomlight!
ActualRequirements: Place a shroomlight

Description: Light up the area with soul fire torches and soul fire lanterns!
ActualRequirements: Place a soul fire torch and a soul fire lantern

Description: Light up the area with all three hues of Froglight
ActualRequirements: Place Ochre, Verdant and Pearlescent Froglights
Source: Vanilla Advancement (renamed from "With our powers combined"

Description: Light up the area with some sea lanterns
ActualRequirements: Place a sea lantern

Description: Light up the area with some end rods
ActualRequirements: Place an end rod

Description: Hold a stack of every light-emitting block and item
ActualRequirements:
Obtain a stack of: Glowstone, Jack o' Lanterns, Redstone Lamps, Sea Lanterns, Sea Pickles, Shroomlight, Lanterns, Campfires, End Rods, Torches, 
Soul Fire Lanterns, Soul Fire Torches, Ender Chests, Redstone Torches, Magma Blocks, Crying Obsidian, Soul Campfires, Amethyst Cluster, 
Small, Medium and Large Amethyst Buds, Glow Lichen, Glow Berries, every type of Candle, Ochre, Verdant and Pearlescent Froglights
The following do not need to be obtained even though they emit light: Beacons, Conduits, Furnaces, Blast Furnaces, Smokers, Redstone Ore, Brewing Stands, 
Brown Mushrooms, Dragon Eggs, Sculk Sensors, Sculk Catalysts and any other light-emitting blocks not mentioned

Description: Chop down enough trees to collect a full stack of one log type
ItemRewards: 8 Logs of the type that you got a stack of

Description: Craft a bark block
ActualRequirements: Obtain a "wood" or "hyphae" block of any kind

Description: Strip a bark block of its bark
ActualRequirements: Strip a wood or hyphae block using an axe

Description: Craft every type of item made out of oak wood
ActualRequirements:
For the respective type of wood, obtain: Planks, Log, Wood, Stripped Log, Stripped Wood, Slab, Pressure Plate, Fence, Trapdoor, Fence Gate, Stairs, 
Button, Door, Boat, Chest Boat, Sign and Hanging Sign.
Saplings and Leaves are not required.

Description: Craft every type of item made out of spruce wood
ActualRequirements:
For the respective type of wood, obtain: Planks, Log, Wood, Stripped Log, Stripped Wood, Slab, Pressure Plate, Fence, Trapdoor, Fence Gate, Stairs, 
Button, Door, Boat, Chest Boat, Sign and Hanging Sign.
Saplings and Leaves are not required.

ActualRequirements: Obtain the following items: Bamboo Planks, Mosaic, Blocks, Stripped Blocks, Slab, Mosaic Slab, Pressure Plate, Fence, Trapdoor, Fence Gate, Stairs, Mosaic Stairs, Button, Door, Boat, Chest Boat, Sign and Hanging Sign

Description: Collect every type of log and stem
ActualRequirements: The wood types required are: Oak, Spruce, Birch, Jungle, Acacia, Dark Oak, Crimson, Warped, Mangrove, Bamboo and Cherry

Description: Strip the bark off every type of log, stem and bamboo block
ActualRequirements: The wood types required are: Oak, Spruce, Birch, Jungle, Acacia, Dark Oak, Crimson, Warped, Mangrove, Bamboo and Cherry

Description: Cut down a full stack of logs and stems of all types
ActualRequirements: The wood types required are: Oak, Spruce, Birch, Jungle, Acacia, Dark Oak, Crimson, Warped, Mangrove, Bamboo and Cherry

Description: It's coarse, and rough, and irritating, and it gets everywhere
ActualRequirements: Obtain sand

Description: Use a shovel to create dirt paths
ActualRequirements: Right-click a grass block using any shovel

Description: Obtain every type of grass block in your inventory
ActualRequirements: Obtain grass block, podzol, mycelium, crimson nylium, and warped nylium

Description: Place a Grass Block high in the sky
ActualRequirements: Place a grass block at y-level 280 or higher in the Overworld
ItemRewards: 1 Water Bucket, 1 Lava Bucket, 1 Oak Sapling

Description: Smelt sand in a furnace to get glass
ActualRequirements: Obtain a glass block

Description: Craft some glass panes
Craft every color of stained glass
Craft a stack of all 16 colors of stained glass panes
Use a Water Bottle on some Dirt to turn it into Mud
Craft or obtain all forms of Mud and Mud Brick
ActualRequirements: Obtain Mud, Packed Mud, Muddy Mangrove Roots, Mud Brick blocks, slabs, stairs and walls

Description: Craft concrete powder using sand, gravel and dye
ActualRequirements: Obtain any color of concrete powder

Description: Create concrete from concrete powder by dropping it into water
ActualRequirements: Obtain any color of concrete

Description: Craft every color of concrete
Dig up some clay from a lake
ActualRequirements: Obtain clay

Description: Fire up that clay!
ActualRequirements: Obtain a brick block

Description: Craft and place a flower pot
Place every type of plant in a flower pot
ActualRequirements:
Place the following in a flower pot: Dandelion, Poppy, Blue Orchid, Allium, Azure Bluet, Red Tulip, Orange Tulip, White Tulip, Pink Tulip, Oxeye Daisy, 
Cornflower, Lily of the Valley, Wither Rose, Oak Sapling, Spruce Sapling, Birch Sapling, Jungle Sapling, Acacia Sapling, Dark Oak Sapling, Red Mushroom,
Brown Mushroom, Fern, Dead Bush, Cactus, Bamboo, Crimson Fungus, Warped Fungus, Crimson Roots, Warped Roots, Azalea, Flowering Azalea,
Mangrove Propagule, Cherry Sapling, Torchflower

Description: Craft every color of terracotta (stained clay)
Craft every color of glazed terracotta
Collect all the different types of rocks
ActualRequirements: Obtain cobblestone, granite, andesite, diorite, tuff, calcite, dripstone block, cobbled grimstone and smooth basalt

Description: Craft every type of polished block
ActualRequirements: Obtain polished andesite, diorite, granite, deepslate, basalt and blackstone

Description: Craft or obtain all forms of normal, cracked, mossy and chiseled stone bricks
ActualRequirements: Obtain stone brick and mossy stone brick blocks, slabs, stairs and walls, and cracked and chiseled stone bricks

Description: Craft or find some iron bars
Engrave sandstone with creeper and wither patterns
ActualRequirements: Obtain chiseled sandstone and chiseled red sandstone

AdvancementName: Built on Sand, Set in Stone
Description: Craft or collect a stack of all forms of Sandstone and Red Sandstone
ActualRequirements:
Obtain a stack of: Sandstone blocks, slabs, stairs, walls; Smooth Sandstone blocks, slabs, stairs; Cut Sandstone blocks, slabs; Chiseled Sandstone, 
Red Sandstone blocks, slabs, stairs, walls; Smooth Red Sandstone blocks, slabs, stairs; Cut Red Sandstone blocks, slabs; Chiseled Red Sandstone

Description: Craft all forms of Deepslate, Polished Deepslate, Deepslate Bricks and Deepslate Tiles
ActualRequirements:
Obtain: Cobbled Deepslate, Polished Deepslate, Deepslate Brick and Deepslate Tile blocks, slabs, stairs, walls; (regular) Deepslate, Chiseled Deepslate, 
Cracked Deepslate Bricks and Cracked Deepslate Tiles

Description: Craft or collect all forms of nether brick and red nether brick
ActualRequirements: Obtain: Nether Brick and Red Nether Brick blocks, slabs, stairs, and walls; Nether Brick Fence, Cracked Nether Bricks and Chiseled Nether Bricks

Description: Craft all forms of quartz blocks
ActualRequirements: Obtain quartz and smooth quartz blocks, slabs and stairs, quartz pillars and bricks and chiseled quartz blocks

Description: Craft or collect all forms of prismarine blocks
ActualRequirements: Obtain prismarine, dark prismarine and prismarine brick blocks, slabs, stairs, and prismarine walls

Description: Craft a chain using an iron ingot and iron nuggets
Craft all forms of Blackstone, Polished Blackstone and Polished Blackstone Bricks
ActualRequirements:
Obtain: Blackstone, Polished Blackstone and Polished Blackstone Brick blocks, slabs, stairs, and walls; Cracked Polished Blackstone Bricks,
Chiseled Polished Blackstone and Gilded Blackstone

Description: Use your furnace to smelt cobblestone back into normal stone
ActualRequirements: Obtain a block of stone

Description: Smelt normal stone further into smooth stone
Upgrade your furnace to a blast furnace using iron and smooth stone for smelting ores quicker
Craft and place an armor stand
ActualRequirements: Place an armor stand

Description: Get killed from hitting an Armor Stand
ActualRequirements: Get killed by thorns damage from an Armor Stand that is equipped with Thorns-enchanted armor

Description: Place all six sets of armor on six different armor stands
ActualRequirements: Place a full suit of each of the six armors on an armor stand

Description: Craft a grindstone using a stone slab, planks and sticks for repairing tools
Craft a stonecutter using stone and an iron ingot
Craft a smithing table
Notes: Known as "Not for creating copies of yourself" until 1.9

Description: Fill a cauldron using a bucket
Sit in a cauldron filled with lava
ActualRequirements: Enter a lava cauldron

Description: Use a cauldron to clean leather armor, a banner and a shulker box
